title: Evolution Education Module Utilizing Digital Evolution Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic biology and genetics concepts, along with understanding of mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: A weekend-intensive modular design for working learners, utilizing mobile devices and simulation tools similar to Avida-ED.

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively explain natural selection mechanisms through digital evolution simulations
Learners can connect the origins of genetic variation with evolutionary adaptations via simulation data analysis
Learners can apply mathematical approaches to model evolutionary processes across multiple spatiotemporal scales
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
